name: Soapy Prototype
description:
Inspired by Gameboy Era games, Soapy is a platforming adventure game where you control a bar of soap as he rids the world of evil, mischief, and unsanitary situation. Armed with his trusty bubble attack, Soapy is ready to venture forward in the name of cleanliness! 

This prototype was my first venture into the world of game jams (GBJAM9). While I certainly bit off more than I could chew given my current ability level (ok, and maybe a bit of poor time management too...), I'm quite happy with the look and feel of this prototype!

I have lots of ideas that I'd like to continue from here on out, such as a power up system (various bubble attacks), more enemies with various attack methods, more interactive levels, etc.
